casebody.data:
Sonja RITTER, petitioner,
v.
Lois BRADY, Chapter 7 Trustee. No. 18-747. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 19, 2019.

Motion of the Honorable Eugene Wedoff, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Professor Margaret Howard for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
